job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: stronguOverviewbrbrustrongWe are not just offering a job but a meaningful career Come join our passionate teambrbrAs a Fortune 50 company we hire the best employees to serve our customers making us a leader in the insurance and financial services industry State Farm embraces diversity and inclusion to ensure a workforce that is engaged builds on the strengths and talents of all associates and creates a Good Neighbor culturebrbrWe offer competitive benefits and pay with the potential for an annual financial award based on both individual and enterprise performance Our employees have an opportunity to participate in volunteer events within the community and engage in a learning culture We offer programs to assist with tuition reimbursement professional designations employee development wellness initiatives and morebrbrVisit our Careers page for more information on our benefits locations and the process of joining the State Farm teambrbrAs a Machine Learning Engineer you will play in integral role within State Farm for helping build and support advanced analytic solutions that are used across the enterprise Machine Learning Engineers are responsible for helping deploy data science solutions build solutions that optimize analytic workflows and assisting with analytic research requests With this role your work will help increase use of advanced analytics for decision making throughout the companybrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongBeing part of the Engineering team within our Enterprise Technology ET department will help facilitate your professional growth across multiple development areasbrbrFirst you will strengthen your communication skills through interactions with key business partners that require you to articulate technical concepts in a nontechnical way Additionally the variety of projects that you work on will allow you to refine your knowledge for advanced analytic topics software development practices and tool development for use by the department Finally to help keep your skills sharp this role includes an opportunity for practical research and continued professional development with opportunities to learn and leverage cutting edge tools and many different programming languagesbrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongPreferred Skills amp Professional Experience brstrongulliCompleted Bachelors other advanced degrees and 2 years experience in a computer science or technology related field such as DevOps engineering software engineering or developerliliProficiency with Python 3 including libraries such as Pandas Numpy Scipy Scikitlearn tensorflow h2o pyspark and FlaskliliExperience with gathering and creating analytic business requirements researching potential data sources both internal and external sources designing developing and maintaining data assetsliliFamiliarity with algorithms commonly associated advanced analytic topics including GLMs Treebased models Neural Network frameworks and Natural Language ProcessingliliDemonstrated understanding of software engineering topics including classes functions and version control CICD and unit testsliliExperience deploying models for batch synchronous andor asynchronous consumptionliliFamiliarity with Containerization  Docker KubernetesliliTechnical expertise with multiple compute environments including at least two 2 of the following Linux Hadoop Mainframe and AWSbrliulstrongemliApplicants are required to be eligible to lawfully work in the US immediately employer will not sponsor applicants for US work authorization eg H1B visa for this opportunityliemstrong
